body_html:
Thanks @pierrekilly ! That worked for me.
I was able to get around the issue by running the following script after my devbox wakes up.

sudo rmmod nvidia_uvm
sudo rmmod nvidia_drm
sudo rmmod nvidia_modeset
sudo rmmod nvidia
sudo modprobe nvidia
sudo modprobe nvidia_modeset
sudo modprobe nvidia_drm
sudo modprobe nvidia_uvm

body:
Thanks @pierrekilly ! That worked for me.
I was able to get around the issue by running the following script after my devbox wakes up.

```
sudo rmmod nvidia_uvm
sudo rmmod nvidia_drm
sudo rmmod nvidia_modeset
sudo rmmod nvidia
sudo modprobe nvidia
sudo modprobe nvidia_modeset
sudo modprobe nvidia_drm
sudo modprobe nvidia_uvm
```
